name: treatment of used refrigerant R600a, final disposal | used refrigerant R600a | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20865/documentation

This dataset represents treatment of used refrigerant R-600a by final disposal (incineration). Since specific treatment of R-600a refrigerant by incineration is not yet available in the database a proxy - treatment of average hazardous waste by incineration - is used.;The refrigerant R134a is widely used refrigerant (mainly in automobile air conditioning systems and othere refrigeration and cooling technologies). It can be treated by primary two different technologies; 1) venting and 2) final disposal. ;Since the R134a causes global warming venting as a way of treatment is forbidden in some countries. For example in the US (US EPA, http://www.epa.gov/ozone/title6/608/faq.html, accessed 20141105).

The activity starts, when the used refrigerant is accepted for treatment.

There are no data on the amount of energy needed during this process.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Final disposal of R-600a refers to the destruction of used refrigerant R-600a.

flow.name: used refrigerant R600a
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste

exchanges.description:
Calculated value.

This exchange (average hazardous waste incineration) is a proxy to the specific incineration of the R-600a. When an incineration of R-12 is available in the database this product can be replaced by it.

flow.name: hazardous waste, for incineration
